程序包 yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.lex_wsb_rtm

类 LexWSBRTM

  • java.lang.Object
    • yang.weiwei.lda.LDA
      • yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.RTM
        • yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.lex_wsb_rtm.LexWSBRTM
  • 直接已知子类:
    LexWSBMedRTM
    public class LexWSBRTM
extends RTM
    RTM with lexical weights and weighted stochastic block priors
    作者:
    Weiwei Yang

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 yang.weiwei.lda.rtm.RTM
